column1: What can I do for you?
column2: 1.I can give you some product recommendation based on your previous rating.  2.You can also browse the product based the category you given. 3. You can search the product by typing some attribute of the product. 4. You can ask me some fashion question like “How to become a fashion designer?” , I will give you a solid answer
I’m your fashion chatbot. You can ask me any fashion question, I will try my best to answer your question. Have a nice day!
